actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to allow the obsolete destroyer U.S.S. Edson (DD 946) to be transferred to the Intrepid Sea-Air-Space Museum in New York before the expiration of the otherwise applicable 60-day congressional review period.

summary.text: Allows the obsolete destroyer U.S.S. Edson to be transferred to the Intrepid Sea-Air-Space Museum in New York before the expiration of the otherwise applicable congressional review period.

titles.title: A bill to allow the obsolete destroyer U.S.S. Edson (DD 946) to be transferred to the Intrepid Sea-Air-Space Museum in New York before the expiration of the otherwise applicable 60-day congressional review period.
